TEXT: Once a great champion, he's fallen on hard times. But he's looking to reclaim his title.
You square off to face the throbbing horror...

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~brother,~ ~and~ ~fulfill~ ~your~ ~destiny~ ~as~ ~the~ ~true~ ~Champion~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
